mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_reservation_mst ( seat_id, emp_id, start_date, end_date, start_time, end_time ) VALUES ( #{seat_id}, #{emp_id}, #{start_date}, #{end_date}, #{start_time}, #{end_time} );
mapper.select: SELECT reservations.seat_id, reservations.emp_id, reservations.start_date, reservations.end_date, reservations.start_time, reservations.end_time FROM tbl_reservation_mst AS reservations INNER JOIN tbl_seat_mst AS seats ON seats.seat_id = reservations.seat_id WHERE seats.seat_id = #{seat_id};
